languages.text: "Как-то в Каликсисе нас направили на мир-улей, задолжавший десятину. Встречали нас трупы, просто могильник размером с планету — ни единого признака жизни. Гляжу на этот мир, и ощущения те же".

"Once in Calixis, we were sent to a hive world that owed a tithe debt. What we found were corpses, just a planet-sized burial ground, not a single sign of life. Looking at this world, it feels the same."
languages.original_text: "Как-то в Каликсисе нас направили на мир-улей, задолжавший десятину. Встречали нас трупы, просто могильник размером с планету — ни единого признака жизни. Гляжу на этот мир, и ощущения те же".

traits.locale_text: "Once in Calixis, we were sent to a hive world that owed a tithe debt. What we found were corpses, just a planet-sized burial ground, not a single sign of life. Looking at this world, it feels the same."

"Once in Calixis, we were sent to a hive world that owed a tithe debt. What we found were corpses, just a planet-sized burial ground, not a single sign of life. Looking at this world, it feels the same."

languages.text: 「かつてキャリクシスで、租税の負債を負った過密惑星に派遣されたことがある。そこで見つけたのは死体ばかりで、惑星規模の埋葬地で、生命の兆候は一つもなかった。この惑星を見ていると、それと同じように感じる」
languages.original_text: "Once in Calixis, we were sent to a hive world that owed a tithe debt. What we found were corpses, just a planet-sized burial ground, not a single sign of life. Looking at this world, it feels the same."

traits.locale_text: 「かつてキャリクシスで、租税の負債を負った過密惑星に派遣されたことがある。そこで見つけたのは死体ばかりで、惑星規模の埋葬地で、生命の兆候は一つもなかった。この惑星を見ていると、それと同じように感じる」

languages.text: "Wir wurden in Calixis einmal zu einer Makropolwelt geschickt, die eine Zehntschuld hatte. Wir haben nur Leichen gefunden, eine Begräbnisstätte in Planetengröße, ohne ein einziges Lebenszeichen. Diese Welt hier fühlt sich genauso an."
languages.original_text: "Once in Calixis, we were sent to a hive world that owed a tithe debt. What we found were corpses, just a planet-sized burial ground, not a single sign of life. Looking at this world, it feels the same."

traits.locale_text: "Wir wurden in Calixis einmal zu einer Makropolwelt geschickt, die eine Zehntschuld hatte. Wir haben nur Leichen gefunden, eine Begräbnisstätte in Planetengröße, ohne ein einziges Lebenszeichen. Diese Welt hier fühlt sich genauso an."

languages.text: "Bir keresinde Calixis'te aşar borcu olan bir kovan dünyaya gönderilmiştik. Tek bulabildiğimiz; cesetlerden ibaret, gezegen büyüklüğünde bir mezarlıktı. Tek bir yaşam emaresi yoktu. Bu dünya da o aynı hissi veriyor."
languages.original_text: "Once in Calixis, we were sent to a hive world that owed a tithe debt. What we found were corpses, just a planet-sized burial ground, not a single sign of life. Looking at this world, it feels the same."

traits.locale_text: "Bir keresinde Calixis'te aşar borcu olan bir kovan dünyaya gönderilmiştik. Tek bulabildiğimiz; cesetlerden ibaret, gezegen büyüklüğünde bir mezarlıktı. Tek bir yaşam emaresi yoktu. Bu dünya da o aynı hissi veriyor."

languages.text: «Una vez, en Calixis, nos enviaron a un mundo colmena que debía el diezmo. Lo que encontramos fueron cadáveres. Un cementerio a escala planetaria sin ningún resto de vida. Este mundo me da la misma sensación».
languages.original_text: "Once in Calixis, we were sent to a hive world that owed a tithe debt. What we found were corpses, just a planet-sized burial ground, not a single sign of life. Looking at this world, it feels the same."

traits.locale_text: «Una vez, en Calixis, nos enviaron a un mundo colmena que debía el diezmo. Lo que encontramos fueron cadáveres. Un cementerio a escala planetaria sin ningún resto de vida. Este mundo me da la misma sensación».

languages.text: “以前在卡利西斯的时候，我们去过某个欠了什一税的巢都世界。那里到处都是尸体，整颗行星都变成了一座坟场，没有任何生命迹象。眼前这个世界，也给了我同样的感觉。”
languages.original_text: "Once in Calixis, we were sent to a hive world that owed a tithe debt. What we found were corpses, just a planet-sized burial ground, not a single sign of life. Looking at this world, it feels the same."

traits.locale_text: “以前在卡利西斯的时候，我们去过某个欠了什一税的巢都世界。那里到处都是尸体，整颗行星都变成了一座坟场，没有任何生命迹象。眼前这个世界，也给了我同样的感觉。”

languages.text: « Une fois dans Calixis, nous avons été envoyés dans un monde ruche qui n'avait pas versé sa dîme. Mais nous n'y avons découvert que des cadavres. La planète était un véritable charnier dénué de toute vie. Cette planète m'évoque le même sentiment. »
languages.original_text: "Once in Calixis, we were sent to a hive world that owed a tithe debt. What we found were corpses, just a planet-sized burial ground, not a single sign of life. Looking at this world, it feels the same."

traits.locale_text: « Une fois dans Calixis, nous avons été envoyés dans un monde ruche qui n'avait pas versé sa dîme. Mais nous n'y avons découvert que des cadavres. La planète était un véritable charnier dénué de toute vie. Cette planète m'évoque le même sentiment. »
